StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPtadPraspRequestsByDateAndOrg]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @Organiza.onId int ) AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
DECLARE @BeginDate date.me SET @BeginDate = DATEADD(year, -7, GetDate())
SELECT R.RequestId, R.OriginatorUserId, RT.RequestTypeId, RT.RequestType, RT.XsdFileName, RT.RequestTypeID, RAS.RequestApprovalStatus, R.RequestDate, R.RequestXML, '' as RSS_NAME, '' as ApplicantName FROM USMC.Request R INNER JOIN USMC.RequestType RT ON RT.RequestTypeID = R.RequestTypeId INNER JOIN USMC.RequestApproval ra ON ra.RequestId = r.RequestId INNER JOIN USMC.RequestApprovalStatus ras ON ras.RequestApprovalStatusId = ra.RequestApprovalStatusId WHERE (RequestType = 'Prasp' OR RequestType = 'Ptad') AND r.RequestDate > @BeginDate AND ra.RequestApprovalStatusId != 1 ORDER BY r.RequestDate DESC
END
